# Video Conference Application - Project Instructions

## Project Overview
Full-stack video conference web application with React, TypeScript, Express, and JSON-based database.

## Technology Stack
- Frontend: React 18 + TypeScript + Vite
- Backend: Express + TypeScript
- Database: JSON file-based storage
- API: OpenAPI/Swagger documentation
- Real-time: Socket.io + WebRTC
- Authentication: JWT tokens
